name: BBTAN: 7YEARS
description:
It`s 111% BBTAN`s Special Edition “BBTAN : 7Years”!!!
Swipe your finger down to throw balls and break bricks!
Try to break the brick in various mode!
The angle is the key point.
Turn 7 year old BBBOY's time to come back to 31 year old BBBOY.
Did you ever imagine that a Special Edition BBTAN would be released?

Simple, but Addictive
BBTAN : 7Years by 111%
